commit.message:
2003-10-15  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* java/util/zip/InflaterInputStream.java
	(InflaterInputStream): Renamed infl to inf and bufsize to size,
	added description to exception, check for inf == null and size < 0.

From-SVN: r72519
